service.name: Mesh Provisioning Service
service.informativeText: Abstract: The Mesh Provisioning Service allows a Provisioning Client to provision a Provisioning Server to allow it to participate in the mesh network.

characteristic.name: Mesh Provisioning Data In
characteristic.informativeText: Abstract: The Mesh Provisioning Data In characteristic can be written to send a Proxy PDU message containing Provisioning PDU to the Provisioning Server.

characteristic.name: Mesh Provisioning Data Out
characteristic.informativeText: Abstract: The Mesh Provisioning Data Out characteristic can be notified to send a Proxy PDU message containing Provisioning PDU from a Provisioning Server to a Provisioning Client.
